b'Tinka\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00'

Life: 1021  -> 1111111101    These 0b111111110100001110 == 261390
Life MAX: 1040  -> 10000010000    Code 6: 110
110
00000000000010000010000


Stamina: 574  -> 1000111110
Vit: 510 -> 111111110


Theorie:
Das ist der Block. Code 7, dann 1021.
000000111
0001111111101  <- 13 Bit.
Danach:
000011100 (28|12)

Forward:
000000011 <- Vitality (3)
11111110 <- Vitality

000001000 <- 8
0011000001000111110 <- Stamina (10|11) AKA [1010|1011]

00000000000
0010110001000111110 <- Stamina


0000000000000101000000

00100011 <- Energy

0000000000000100100000001000110000000000000

1000001000  <- Life Max
001000000000000

Health Max! [173:182][182:195]  <- 13bit!
000000111
0001111111101


000011100 <-28
000001100111111110000000011000001100100000001000001000110000000010000001010000000000
